## ValidConditionName type

Ensures that a condition name is alphanumeric.

**Signature:**

```typescript
export declare type ValidConditionName<Name> = Name extends `${Letter}${infer Tail}` ? OnlyChars<Letter | Digit, Tail> : never;
```
**References:** [Letter](./react.letter.md)<!-- -->, [OnlyChars](./react.onlychars.md)<!-- -->, [Digit](./react.digit.md)
